attributes.action: Listen and respond to needs from the LGBTQ+ community
attributes.background: Many people have been affected by crime against LGBTQ+ community and as we enter a new era we wish that people would be more accepting to the people in this community and for this to start the government must respond to the needs from the LGBTQ+ community.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Government recently ran a survey to understand the experiences of lesbian, gay, bisexual or transgender (LGBT) people living in the UK. You can find out more about that here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/national-lgbt-survey
